com.client.GUI.panels

Class GUIPanelMovable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.client.GUI.panels.GUIPanel
      • com.client.GUI.panels.GUIPanelMovable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ButtonArrow, GenderIcon, GUIButton, GUICollisionObject, GUIPanelControlBar, GUIPanelMessage, GUIPanelPlayerCreate, GUIPanelPlayerInventory, GUIPanelPlayerSpells, GUIPanelQuit, InventorySlot

    public abstract class GUIPanelMovable
extends GUIPanel
    Encapsulates any movable panel (i.e., any panel that is, in principle at least, movable). This implies that all instances will have a relative position to a containing frame, and an absolute position that can be calculated recursively from these relative positions.
    Author:
    Ian
